apihelp-query+pageterms-example-simple: Get aw terms associatit wi the page 'London', in the uiser leid.
apihelp-query+pageterms-example-label-en: Get labels an aliases associatit wi the page 'London', in Scots.
apihelp-query+pageterms-param-terms: The teeps o terms to get, e.g. 'description'. If nae specified, aw teeps are returned.
apihelp-query+wikibase-example: Get URL path an ither information aboot Wikibase client an repository.
apihelp-query+wikibase-param-prop:
Which properties tae get:
;<kbd>url</kbd>: Base URL, script path an airticle path o the Wikibase repository.
;<kbd>siteid</kbd>: The siteid o this steid.
